name: Zatca Status Report
report_script:
def get_columns():
    return [
        {'fieldname': 'name', 'label': _('Inv.Number'), 'fieldtype': 'Link', 'options': 'Sales Invoice', 'width': 120},
        {'fieldname': 'posting_date', 'label': _('Date'), 'fieldtype': 'Date', 'width': 110},
        {'fieldname': 'customer_name', 'label': _('Customer'), 'fieldtype': 'Data', 'width': 200},
        {'fieldname': 'grand_total', 'label': _('Total'), 'fieldtype': 'Currency', 'width': 100},
        {'fieldname': 'custom_zatca_status', 'label': _('Status'), 'fieldtype': 'Data', 'width': 100}
    ]

def get_data_and_chart(filters):
    conditions = "AND 1=1 "
    if(filters.get('status')):
        conditions = f"AND custom_zatca_status = '{filters.get('status')}'"
    dt_from = filters.get('dt_from')
    dt_to = filters.get('dt_to')
    conditions =conditions +  f" AND posting_date between '{dt_from}' and '{dt_to}'"

    query = f"""
    SELECT name ,
               customer_name ,posting_date,
               grand_total ,
               custom_zatca_status 
        FROM `tabSales Invoice` where 1=1 {conditions} 
    """
   
    data = frappe.db.sql(query, as_dict=True)

    return data

columns = get_columns()
data = get_data_and_chart(filters)

data = columns, data, None, None
